title: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When the label font size is modified, the label height does not change immediately. This issue occurs in the user interface.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the user interface.
2. Modify the font size of a label.
3. Observe that the label height remains unchanged despite the font modification.
OB: The label height does not change right after modifying the label font size in the user interface.
EB: After modifying the label font size, the label height should adjust accordingly in the user interface.
SR:
1. Open the user interface.
2. Navigate to the label settings.
3. Modify the font size of a label.
4. Observe that the label height adjusts to fit the new font size.
